title: Authors and Citation
text: Jake Hughey. Author, maintainer. Robert . Author.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Hughey J, R (2025). rsurveycto: Interact Data 'SurveyCTO'. R package version 0.2.1, https://agency-fund.github.io/rsurveycto/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {rsurveycto: Interact with Data on 'SurveyCTO'},   author = {Jake Hughey and Robert On},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.2.1},   url = {https://agency-fund.github.io/rsurveycto/}, }

title: Interact with Data on SurveyCTO
text: SurveyCTO platform mobile data collection offline settings. rsurveycto R package uses SurveyCTO REST API read datasets forms SurveyCTO server R data.tables download file attachments. package also limited support write datasets server.

title: Interact with Data on SurveyCTO
text: Install CRAN: Install development version:
code: install.packages('rsurveycto') # install.packages('pak') pak::pak('agency-fund/rsurveycto')

title: Interact with Data on SurveyCTO
text: basic example: details, see reference documentation.
code: library('data.table') library('rsurveycto')  # user must have permission to download data and # "allow server API access" must be enabled auth = scto_auth('PATH_TO_AUTH_FILE')  # read a single dataset or form cases = scto_read(auth, 'cases')  # get a table of all datasets and forms catalog = scto_catalog(auth)

what: Drop empty columns from a data.table — drop_empties
title: Drop empty columns from a data.table — drop_empties
text: empty column one whose values NA "".

title: Drop empty columns from a data.table — drop_empties
code: drop_empties(d)

title: Drop empty columns from a data.table — drop_empties
text: d data.table.

title: Drop empty columns from a data.table — drop_empties
text: d modified reference, invisibly.

title: Drop empty columns from a data.table — drop_empties
code: library('data.table') d = data.table(w = 3:4, x = c('', 'foo'), y = c(NA, NA), z = c(NA, '')) drop_empties(d) #>        w      x #>    <int> <char> #> 1:     3        #> 2:     4    foo

what: rsurveycto: Interact with Data on 'SurveyCTO' — rsurveycto-package
title: rsurveycto: Interact with Data on 'SurveyCTO' — rsurveycto-package
text: 'SurveyCTO' platform mobile data collection offline settings. 'rsurveycto' R package uses 'SurveyCTO' REST API https://docs.surveycto.com/05-exporting--publishing-data/05-api-access/01.api-access.html read datasets forms 'SurveyCTO' server R 'data.table's download file attachments. package also limited support write datasets server.

title: rsurveycto: Interact with Data on 'SurveyCTO' — rsurveycto-package
text: Maintainer: Jake Hughey jake@agency.fund Authors: Robert robert@agency.fund

what: Authenticate with a SurveyCTO server — scto_auth
title: Authenticate with a SurveyCTO server — scto_auth
text: SurveyCTO's API supports basic authentication using username password. Make sure user assigned role permission download data ("data manager" greater) "Allow server API access" enabled.

title: Authenticate with a SurveyCTO server — scto_auth
code: scto_auth(   auth_file = NULL,   servername = NULL,   username = NULL,   password = NULL,   validate = TRUE )

title: Authenticate with a SurveyCTO server — scto_auth
text: auth_file String indicating path text file containing server name first line, username second, password third. arguments used auth_file NULL. servername String indicating name SurveyCTO server. username String indicating username SurveyCTO account. password String indicating password SurveyCTO account. validate Logical indicating whether validate credentials calling scto_meta(). set FALSE debugging.

title: Authenticate with a SurveyCTO server — scto_auth
text: scto_auth object authenticated SurveyCTO session.

title: Authenticate with a SurveyCTO server — scto_auth
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # preferred approach auth = scto_auth('scto_auth.txt')  # alternate approach auth = scto_auth('my_server', 'my_user', 'my_pw', auth_file = NULL) } # }

what: Fetch file attachments from a SurveyCTO server — scto_get_attachments
title: Fetch file attachments from a SurveyCTO server — scto_get_attachments
text: function can download encrypted unencrypted files attached forms.

title: Fetch file attachments from a SurveyCTO server — scto_get_attachments
code: scto_get_attachments(   auth,   urls,   output_dir,   private_key = NULL,   overwrite = TRUE )

title: Fetch file attachments from a SurveyCTO server — scto_get_attachments
text: auth scto_auth() object. urls Character vector API URLs file attachments. typically derived column data.table returned scto_read(). Can contain missing values. output_dir String indicating path directory save files. private_key String indicating path private key file. needs non-NULL decrypt encrypted file attachments. overwrite Logical indicating whether overwrite existing files.

title: Fetch file attachments from a SurveyCTO server — scto_get_attachments
text: character vector file names length urls, NA missing invalid URLs.

title: Fetch file attachments from a SurveyCTO server — scto_get_attachments
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ auth = scto_auth('scto_auth.txt') form_data = scto_read(auth, 'my_form', 'form') filenames = scto_get_attachments(auth, form_data[['my_attachment']], '.') } # }

what: Fetch deployed form definitions from a SurveyCTO server — scto_get_form_definitions
title: Fetch deployed form definitions from a SurveyCTO server — scto_get_form_definitions
text: function fetches definitions currently deployed forms. superseded favor scto_get_form_metadata(), fetches metadata, including defintions, deployed previous versions forms.

title: Fetch deployed form definitions from a SurveyCTO server — scto_get_form_definitions
code: scto_get_form_definitions(auth, form_ids = NULL, simplify = TRUE)

title: Fetch deployed form definitions from a SurveyCTO server — scto_get_form_definitions
text: auth scto_auth() object. form_ids Character vector indicating form ids. NULL indicates forms. simplify Logical indicating whether return definition one form simple list instead named, nested list.

title: Fetch deployed form definitions from a SurveyCTO server — scto_get_form_definitions
text: simplify TRUE getting one form definition, list. Otherwise named list lists containing definition form.

title: Fetch deployed form definitions from a SurveyCTO server — scto_get_form_definitions
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ auth = scto_auth('scto_auth.txt') form_def = scto_get_form_definitions(auth, 'my_form') form_defs = scto_get_form_definitions(auth) } # }

what: Fetch form metadata from a SurveyCTO server — scto_get_form_metadata
title: Fetch form metadata from a SurveyCTO server — scto_get_form_metadata
text: function fetches metadata, including form definitions, deployed previous versions one forms.

title: Fetch form metadata from a SurveyCTO server — scto_get_form_metadata
code: scto_get_form_metadata(   auth,   form_ids = NULL,   deployed_only = FALSE,   get_defs = TRUE )

title: Fetch form metadata from a SurveyCTO server — scto_get_form_metadata
text: auth scto_auth() object. form_ids Character vector indicating form ids. NULL indicates forms. deployed_only Logical indicating whether fetch metadata versions form, deployed version. get_defs Logical indicating whether fetch form definitions.

title: Fetch form metadata from a SurveyCTO server — scto_get_form_metadata
text: data.table one row per form (per version, deployed_only FALSE). Definitions returned nested data.tables, can unnested using scto_unnest_form_definitions().

title: Fetch form metadata from a SurveyCTO server — scto_get_form_metadata
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ auth = scto_auth('scto_auth.txt') form_metadata = scto_get_form_metadata(auth, 'my_form') form_defs = scto_unnest_form_definitions(form_metadata) } # }

what: Read metadata from a SurveyCTO server — scto_meta
title: Read metadata from a SurveyCTO server — scto_meta
text: functions read metadata SurveyCTO server.

title: Read metadata from a SurveyCTO server — scto_meta
code: scto_meta(auth)  scto_catalog(auth)

title: Read metadata from a SurveyCTO server — scto_meta
text: auth scto_auth() object.

title: Read metadata from a SurveyCTO server — scto_meta
text: scto_meta() returns nested list metadata related forms, datasets, groups, publishing information. scto_catalog() returns data.table one row per form dataset.

title: Read metadata from a SurveyCTO server — scto_meta
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ auth = scto_auth('scto_auth.txt') metadata = scto_meta(auth) catalog = scto_catalog(auth) } # }

what: Suppress or permit messages from rsurveycto — scto_quiet
title: Suppress or permit messages from rsurveycto — scto_quiet
text: default, rsurveycto prints messages console. suppress , set rsurveycto_quiet option TRUE use function.

title: Suppress or permit messages from rsurveycto — scto_quiet
code: scto_quiet(quiet = NULL)

title: Suppress or permit messages from rsurveycto — scto_quiet
text: quiet logical indicating whether suppress messages, NULL.

title: Suppress or permit messages from rsurveycto — scto_quiet
text: quiet NULL, current value rsurveycto_quiet option. Otherwise, previous value rsurveycto_quiet option invisibly.

title: Suppress or permit messages from rsurveycto — scto_quiet
code: options(rsurveycto_quiet = TRUE) scto_quiet() #> [1] TRUE scto_quiet(FALSE)

what: Read data from a SurveyCTO server — scto_read
title: Read data from a SurveyCTO server — scto_read
text: function can read datasets forms.

title: Read data from a SurveyCTO server — scto_read
code: scto_read(   auth,   ids = NULL,   start_date = as.POSIXct("1900-01-01", tz = "UTC"),   review_status = "approved",   private_key = NULL,   drop_empty_cols = FALSE,   convert_datetime = c("CompletionDate", "SubmissionDate", "starttime", "endtime"),   datetime_format = "%b %e, %Y %I:%M:%S %p",   simplify = TRUE )

title: Read data from a SurveyCTO server — scto_read
text: auth scto_auth() object. ids Character vector indicating ids datasets /forms. NULL indicates datasets forms. start_date Date-time something coercible date-time indicating earliest date-time (UTC timezone) fetch data. used forms. Use caution, fields deleted prior start_date show , even submissions prior start_date data fields. review_status String character vector indicating submissions fetch. Possible values "approved", "pending", "rejected", combination three. used forms. private_key String indicating path private key file. needs non-NULL read encrypted form data. drop_empty_cols Logical indicating whether drop columns contain NA empty string. convert_datetime Character vector column names data convert strings datetimes (POSIXct). Use NULL convert columns datetimes. datetime_format String indicating format datetimes SurveyCTO. See strptime(). simplify Logical indicating whether return data.table instead list data.tables reading one form dataset.

title: Read data from a SurveyCTO server — scto_read
text: simplify TRUE reading one form dataset, data.table. Otherwise named list data.tables, one form dataset, along data.table named ".catalog" scto_catalog().

title: Read data from a SurveyCTO server — scto_read
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ auth = scto_auth('scto_auth.txt') form_data = scto_read(auth, 'my_form') all_data = scto_read(auth) } # }

what: Unnest previously fetched form definitions — scto_unnest_form_definitions
title: Unnest previously fetched form definitions — scto_unnest_form_definitions
text: function unnests form definitions, e.g., multiple versions form, can make easier map values labels later step.

title: Unnest previously fetched form definitions — scto_unnest_form_definitions
code: scto_unnest_form_definitions(form_metadata, by_form_id = TRUE)

title: Unnest previously fetched form definitions — scto_unnest_form_definitions
text: form_metadata data.table returned scto_get_form_metadata(). by_form_id Logical indicating whether unnest definitions multiple versions given form (default), unnest definitions forms together.

title: Unnest previously fetched form definitions — scto_unnest_form_definitions
text: by_form_id TRUE, data.table data.tables survey, choices, settings components form definitions. Otherwise list data.tables.

title: Unnest previously fetched form definitions — scto_unnest_form_definitions
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ auth = scto_auth('scto_auth.txt') form_metadata = scto_get_form_metadata(auth, 'my_form') form_defs = scto_unnest_form_definitions(form_metadata) } # }

what: Write data to a SurveyCTO server — scto_write
title: Write data to a SurveyCTO server — scto_write
text: function updates existing dataset using web POST request, uploading data officially supported SurveyCTO API.

title: Write data to a SurveyCTO server — scto_write
code: scto_write(   auth,   data,   dataset_id,   dataset_title = dataset_id,   append = FALSE,   fill = FALSE )

title: Write data to a SurveyCTO server — scto_write
text: auth scto_auth() object. data data.frame upload. dataset_id String indicating id existing dataset. dataset_title String indicating title dataset. replace existing title, regardless append. append Logical indicating whether append replace dataset. fill Logical indicating whether implicitly fill missing columns NA, .e., whether allow mismatch columns existing dataset columns data. used append TRUE.

title: Write data to a SurveyCTO server — scto_write
text: list elements: data_old: data.table previous version dataset. response: object class httr::response() POST request.

title: Write data to a SurveyCTO server — scto_write
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ auth = scto_auth('scto_auth.txt') r = scto_write(auth, data, 'my_dataset', 'My Dataset') } # }

title: rsurveycto 0.2.1
text: CRAN release: 2024-09-03 Improved handling integer values choices sheet form definitions. Clarified information scto_catalog(). Changed is_deployed scto_get_form_metadata() logical.

title: rsurveycto 0.2.0
text: CRAN release: 2024-08-17 Added fetching form metadata, including defintions, previous deployed versions using scto_get_form_metadata(). Added unnesting form definitions using scto_unnest_form_definitions(). Added information provided scto_catalog(). Fixed scto_read() use return timestamps UTC.

title: rsurveycto 0.1.6
text: CRAN release: 2023-09-13 Added parsing groups.

title: rsurveycto 0.1.5
text: Fixed linting issues.

title: rsurveycto 0.1.4
text: CRAN release: 2022-11-24 Enabled scto_read() read one, multiple, forms datasets. Added simplify argument scto_read() scto_get_form_definitions().

title: rsurveycto 0.1.3
text: Fixed scto_read() return result invisibly. Added column version output scto_catalog(). Added scto_get_form_definitions() just .

title: rsurveycto 0.1.2
text: CRAN release: 2022-10-24 Fixed drop_empties() return result invisibly.

title: rsurveycto 0.1.1
text: Added argument validate scto_auth() debugging. Added column title output scto_catalog(). Updated documentation.

title: rsurveycto 0.1.0
text: CRAN release: 2022-09-27 scto_read() longer requires user provide argument type. Added scto_read_all() scto_catalog() functions read datasets forms.

title: rsurveycto 0.0.9
text: Added handling parallel requests.

title: rsurveycto 0.0.8
text: Added check valid username password.

title: rsurveycto 0.0.7
text: Added scto_meta() function fetch SurveyCTO metadata.

title: rsurveycto 0.0.6
text: Added options scto_write().

title: rsurveycto 0.0.5
text: CRAN release: 2022-09-08 Removed default output directory per CRAN requirements. Removed caching simplicity meeting CRAN requirements.

title: rsurveycto 0.0.4
text: Ready CRAN submission.
